title: A little bit of help please?
content:
Hi everyone,

I’m currently at university working on my final major project and was hoping for some advice. I am building a website for a vintage clothing company and am struggling to pick a typeface. I’m looking for something similar to the font used on Vogue magazine??

Thank you

 [‹ Adobe Type Motion Graphics](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720173510/http:/typophile.com/node/34374 "Go to previous forum topic") [How to erase account? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720173510/http:/typophile.com/node/44108 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hilary_88

comments.content:
Something in the Modern way, like Bodoni or Didot is going to do that. There’s also a thread here somewhere about branding a vintage clothing store.

[Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720173510/http:/www.stonetypefoundry.com/itcbodoni.html) is on sale through the Stone Foundry at the moment.
You’ve really helped me out! Thanks
p.s. where would I look for that thread? (sorry I’m new to all this!)
Welcome. Best wishes with your venture!
